trans-unit.source: Represents an abstraction of an access control entry (ACE) that defines an access rule for a file or directory.
trans-unit.target: 表示定义文件或目录的访问规则的访问控制项 (ACE) 的抽象。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAccessRule> class represents an abstraction of an underlying access control entry (ACE) that specifies a user account, the type of access to provide (read, write, and so on), and whether to allow or deny that right.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAccessRule>类表示基础访问控制项 (ACE)，指定的用户帐户，要提供 （读取、 写入和等等） 的访问的类型的抽象，以及是否允许或拒绝该权限。

trans-unit.source: This class can also specify how access rules are propagated to child objects.
trans-unit.target: 此类还可以指定如何将访问规则传播到子对象。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAccessRule> class to create a new access rule.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAccessRule>类创建新的访问规则。

trans-unit.source: You can persist the rule using the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity> or <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity> class.
trans-unit.target: 您可以保留规则使用<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity>或<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity>类。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity> class to add and then remove an access control entry (ACE) from a file.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity>类添加，然后从文件删除访问控制项 (ACE)。

trans-unit.source: You must supply a valid user or group account to run this example.
trans-unit.target: 你必须提供有效的用户或组帐户以运行此示例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAccessRule" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAccessRule" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference" /> object that encapsulates a reference to a user account.
trans-unit.target: 封装对用户帐户的引用的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights" /> values that specifies the type of operation associated with the access rule.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights" /> 值之一，该值指定与访问规则关联的操作的类型。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType" /> values that specifies whether to allow or deny the operation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType" /> 值之一，该值指定是允许还是拒绝该操作。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAccessRule" /> class using a reference to a user account, a value that specifies the type of operation associated with the access rule, and a value that specifies whether to allow or deny the operation.
trans-unit.target: 使用以下内容初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAccessRule" /> 类的新实例：对用户帐户的引用、指定与访问规则关联的操作的类型的值，以及指定是允许还是拒绝该操作的值。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create an access control rule that you can persist using the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity> or <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用此构造函数创建访问控制规则，您可以保留使用<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity>或<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity>类。

trans-unit.source: Access control rules define user account rights that determine which actions are allowed or disallowed on computers running Microsoft Windows.
trans-unit.target: 访问控制规则定义确定哪些操作是允许还是不允许在运行 Microsoft Windows 计算机上的用户帐户权限。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="identity" /> parameter is not an <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="identity" /> 参数不是一个 <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="identity" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="identity" /> 参数为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: An incorrect enumeration was passed to the <paramref name="type" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 一个错误枚举被传递给 <paramref name="type" /> 参数。

trans-unit.source: The name of a user account.
trans-unit.target: 用户帐户的名称。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights" /> values that specifies the type of operation associated with the access rule.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights" /> 值之一，该值指定与访问规则关联的操作的类型。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType" /> values that specifies whether to allow or deny the operation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType" /> 值之一，该值指定是允许还是拒绝该操作。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAccessRule" /> class using the name of a user account, a value that specifies the type of operation associated with the access rule, and a value that describes whether to allow or deny the operation.
trans-unit.target: 使用以下内容初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAccessRule" /> 类的新实例：用户帐户的名称、指定与访问规则关联的操作的类型的值，以及描述是允许还是拒绝该操作的值。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create an access control rule that you can persist using the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity> or <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用此构造函数创建访问控制规则，您可以保留使用<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity>或<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity>类。

trans-unit.source: Access control rules define user account rights that determine which actions are allowed or disallowed on computers running Microsoft Windows.
trans-unit.target: 访问控制规则定义确定哪些操作是允许还是不允许在运行 Microsoft Windows 计算机上的用户帐户权限。

trans-unit.source: The `identity` parameter must identify a valid account on the current computer or domain.
trans-unit.target: `identity`参数必须标识当前计算机或域上有效的帐户。

trans-unit.source: The string takes the following form, where `DOMAIN` is the name of a valid domain or computer name and `account` is the name of a valid user account on a domain or computer: `DOMAIN\account`.
trans-unit.target: 该字符串采用以下形式，其中`DOMAIN`是有效的域名或计算机名的名称和`account`是域或计算机上的有效的用户帐户的名称： `DOMAIN\account`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity> class to add and then remove an access control entry (ACE) from a file.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity>类添加，然后从文件删除访问控制项 (ACE)。

trans-unit.source: You must supply a valid user or group account to run this example.
trans-unit.target: 你必须提供有效的用户或组帐户以运行此示例。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="identity" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="identity" /> 参数为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: An incorrect enumeration was passed to the <paramref name="type" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 一个错误枚举被传递给 <paramref name="type" /> 参数。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference" /> object that encapsulates a reference to a user account.
trans-unit.target: 封装对用户帐户的引用的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights" /> values that specifies the type of operation associated with the access rule.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights" /> 值之一，该值指定与访问规则关联的操作的类型。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.InheritanceFlags" /> values that specifies how access masks are propagated to child objects.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.InheritanceFlags" /> 值之一，该值指定访问掩码如何传播到子对象。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.PropagationFlags" /> values that specifies how Access Control Entries (ACEs) are propagated to child objects.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.PropagationFlags" /> 值之一，该值指定访问控制项 (ACE) 如何传播到子对象。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType" /> values that specifies whether to allow or deny the operation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType" /> 值之一，该值指定是允许还是拒绝该操作。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAccessRule" /> class using a reference to a user account, a value that specifies the type of operation associated with the access rule, a value that determines how rights are inherited, a value that determines how rights are propagated, and a value that specifies whether to allow or deny the operation.
trans-unit.target: 使用以下内容初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAccessRule" /> 类的新实例：对用户帐户的引用、指定与访问规则关联的操作的类型的值、确定如何继承权限的值、确定如何传播权限的值，以及指定是允许还是拒绝该操作的值。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create an access control rule that you can persist using the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity> or <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用此构造函数创建访问控制规则，您可以保留使用<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity>或<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity>类。

trans-unit.source: Access control rules define user account rights that determine which actions are allowed or disallowed on computers running Microsoft Windows.
trans-unit.target: 访问控制规则定义确定哪些操作是允许还是不允许在运行 Microsoft Windows 计算机上的用户帐户权限。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="identity" /> parameter is not an <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="identity" /> 参数不是一个 <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="identity" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="identity" /> 参数为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: An incorrect enumeration was passed to the <paramref name="type" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 一个错误枚举被传递给 <paramref name="type" /> 参数。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: An incorrect enumeration was passed to the <paramref name="inheritanceFlags" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 一个错误枚举被传递给 <paramref name="inheritanceFlags" /> 参数。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: An incorrect enumeration was passed to the <paramref name="propagationFlags" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 一个错误枚举被传递给 <paramref name="propagationFlags" /> 参数。

trans-unit.source: The name of a user account.
trans-unit.target: 用户帐户的名称。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights" /> values that specifies the type of operation associated with the access rule.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights" /> 值之一，该值指定与访问规则关联的操作的类型。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.InheritanceFlags" /> values that specifies how access masks are propagated to child objects.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.InheritanceFlags" /> 值之一，该值指定访问掩码如何传播到子对象。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.PropagationFlags" /> values that specifies how Access Control Entries (ACEs) are propagated to child objects.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.PropagationFlags" /> 值之一，该值指定访问控制项 (ACE) 如何传播到子对象。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType" /> values that specifies whether to allow or deny the operation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType" /> 值之一，该值指定是允许还是拒绝该操作。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAccessRule" /> class using the name of a user account, a value that specifies the type of operation associated with the access rule, a value that determines how rights are inherited, a value that determines how rights are propagated, and a value that specifies whether to allow or deny the operation.
trans-unit.target: 使用以下内容初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAccessRule" /> 类的新实例：用户帐户的名称、指定与访问规则关联的操作的类型的值、确定如何继承权限的值、确定如何传播权限的值，以及指定是允许还是拒绝该操作的值。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create an access control rule that you can persist using the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity> or <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用此构造函数创建访问控制规则，您可以保留使用<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity>或<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity>类。

trans-unit.target: 访问控制规则定义确定哪些操作是允许还是不允许在运行 Microsoft Windows 计算机上的用户帐户权限。

trans-unit.target: `identity`参数必须标识当前计算机或域上有效的帐户。

trans-unit.source: The string takes the following form, where `DOMAIN` is the name of a valid domain or computer name and `account` is the name of a valid user account on a domain or computer: `DOMAIN\account`.
trans-unit.target: 该字符串采用以下形式，其中`DOMAIN`是有效的域名或计算机名的名称和`account`是域或计算机上的有效的用户帐户的名称： `DOMAIN\account`。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="identity" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="identity" /> 参数为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: An incorrect enumeration was passed to the <paramref name="propagationFlags" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 一个错误枚举被传递给 <paramref name="propagationFlags" /> 参数。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights" /> flags associated with the current <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAccessRule" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取与当前 <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights" /> 对象关联的 <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAccessRule" /> 标志。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights" /> flags associated with the current <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAccessRule" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 与当前 <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights" /> 对象关联的 <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAccessRule" /> 标志。
